# simpe group by
"select intcol, count(*) from user group by intcol"
{
  "QueryType": "SELECT",
  "Original": "select intcol, count(*) from user group by intcol",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "Aggregate",
    "Variant": "Ordered",
    "Aggregates": "count(1)",
    "GroupBy": "0",
    "Inputs": [
      {
        "OperatorType": "Route",
        "Variant": "SelectScatter",
        "Keyspace": {
          "Name": "user",
          "Sharded": true
        },
        "FieldQuery": "select intcol, count(*) from `user` where 1 != 1 group by intcol",
        "OrderBy": "0 ASC",
        "Query": "select intcol, count(*) from `user` group by intcol order by intcol asc",
        "Table": "`user`"
      }
    ]
  }
}
Gen4 plan same as above
